picked_headlines.summary: Optimizing EV charging with Smart2ChargeApp for efficiency gains.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a practical application of AI in optimizing electric vehicle charging, appealing to both engineering and management audiences due to its potential impact on energy efficiency and sustainability.

picked_headlines.summary: Survey on financial foundation models in finance.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides a comprehensive overview of the applications and challenges of financial foundation models, relevant for stakeholders interested in the intersection of AI and finance.

digest:
- *Enhancing Urban Visual Place Recognition*: VPR-AttLLM improves flood imagery recognition, crucial for crisis response. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.11811)
- *Fine-tuned LLM-based Code Migration*: Automates SQL code migration, boosting database transformation efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.13515)
- *V-Rex Acceleration*: Enhances real-time video processing for edge deployment. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.12284)
- *Cisco AI Security Framework*: Comprehensive approach to AI risks in various applications. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.12921)
- *Vision Foundry*: Simplifies training of vision AI models for clinical use, reducing barriers. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.11837)
- *AI Hypertrophy Coaching*: Uses sensors for real-time feedback in resistance training. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.11854)
- *Automated Plant Disease Detection*: Hybrid model for offline use in resource-limited areas. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.11871)
- *EmeraldMind for Greenwashing Detection*: Enhances transparency in sustainability claims. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.11506)
- *AI Transparency Atlas*: Evaluates AI model documentation for safety compliance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.12443)
- *Adaptive Edge-Cloud Inference*: Optimizes voice command processing, balancing latency and privacy. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.12769)
